text:
The name of our first game
is Misery Lane.

I'm gonna put two
misery markers on the Index,
and the first one is...
you lose your sense of smell.

And, our shrinks have rated that
at a...
The second one is...
you are ignored in a threesome,
which our shrinks put at a...

39.
-What?!

That's why-- That's why
I would never have a threesome.

I don't like queuing, no.
[ Laughter ]

Can I point out,
by the way,

I often get ignored
in a twosome, which is...
worse.
That is worse.

Thank you for sharing,
Murray.
You're welcome.

Thank you for sharing,
Murray.
You're welcome.

Okay, I'm gonna show
each of you an event,

and you don't have to
tell me the exact number --
just if it falls above, below,

or in between the two cards
that are on the Index.

Maddie, you get to go first.
-Okay.

Jameela: Check out this
crash course in misery.

Ohh!
Oh...my God!
[ Audience groans ]

Jameela:
So, this woman is okay.

But, still, look at what
happened to her car.
Wow!

I don't know how much
physical pain she endured,

or the person endured,
with the sign falling on them.

I think
that was traumatic.

But I don't know if she --
it said she was fine, so...

I really think
that's more...

[ Sighs ] Now you're --
Why'd you have to say that?!

Now I don't know!
I gave you my opinion.

I'm here in a goddamn
cat costume.

I already feel
terrible about myself.

You turning around and screaming
at me isn't helping --

Guys, guys, guys, guys!
[ Hisses ]
Jameela: Okay, for $500,

does "a freeway sign
crushes your car"
land above, below, or in between
"you lose your sense of smell"

and "you're ignored
in a threesome"?

-Above.
-You're saying it is above.

Okay, so let's see
what our shrinks say.
Good luck.

I mean, that was --
that's a freeway sign.

It's not even, like,
a fender bender.

I know!
That was destruction.

It's not a stop sign.
Scary as all hell.

I think we have a good chance
of being right here.

Higher, higher, higher.
Oh, oh, oh!

No, no, no, no.
Higher, higher.

[ Ding ]
[ Cheers and applause ]

There she goes.
Nice!

-Yeah!
-You are correct.
You just banked yourself $500.
Yeah!
